forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High near 15C. SE winds shifting to SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High near 60F. SE winds shifting to SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening followed by increasing clouds with showers developing after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening followed by increasing clouds with showers developing after midnight. Low 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High around 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 56F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High around 15C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 48F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 59F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High around 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 61F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 50F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. High 16C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 62F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low near 50F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 15C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 61F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 46F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High near 15C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 59F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny in the morning. Increasing clouds with showers later in the day. High 59F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
